title: The USDA's gardening zones shifted, this map shows you what's changed
dot:
digraph USDA_Hardiness_Map{node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightblue, fontname="Arial"];subgraph cluster_map{label="USDA Plant Hardiness Zones";color=blue;fontsize=14; 2012[label="2012 USDA Map
(Previous Zone Classification)", shape=ellipse];2023[label="2023 USDA Map
(Updated Zone Classification)", shape=ellipse];Zones[label="Hardiness Zones
(e.g., Zone 7a, Zone 8b)", shape=plaintext];}subgraph cluster_changes{label="Climate Change and Zone Shifts";color=red;fontsize=14;Warming[label="Warming Climate
Higher Minimum Temperatures", shape=ellipse];Example[label="Example: St. Louis
Moved from Zone 6b -> 7a", shape=ellipse];}subgraph cluster_impact{label="Impact on Gardening";color=green;fontsize=14;Zone_Info[label="Zone Info: Average Coldest Winter
Temperature (30-year Avg.)", shape=ellipse];Plant_Survival[label="Perennials: Survival Based on
Cold Temps & Winter Conditions", shape=ellipse];Garden_Advice[label="Local Expertise: Nurseries, Extension Services
and Microclimates", shape=ellipse];}subgraph cluster_limitations{label="Limitations of Hardiness Zones";color=orange;fontsize=14;Extremes[label="Extreme Cold Events
Not Accounted for by Zones", shape=ellipse];Summer[label="Summer Temperature
and Dryness Impact", shape=ellipse];Local_Factors[label="Local Factors: Microclimates
(Pavement, Shelters, Etc.)", shape=ellipse];}subgraph cluster_data{label="Data and Calculations";color=purple;fontsize=14;Observation[label="Observation Period: 1991-2020 vs. 1976-2005", shape=ellipse];Data_Improvement[label="Improved Data Collection
from Weather Stations", shape=ellipse];}2012->Zones;2023->Zones;Zones->Warming;Warming->Example;Zones->Zone_Info;Zone_Info->Plant_Survival;Plant_Survival->Garden_Advice;Zones->Extremes;Extremes->Summer;Summer->Local_Factors;Observation->Data_Improvement;Warming->"Increased Risk for Extreme Cold
and Unpredictable Winters";Extremes->"Hardiness Zones Can't Predict
Unusual Cold or Heat Waves";Summer->"Summer Heat Affects Plant Health
Not Accounted for by USDA Map";rankdir=LR;}
